structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Any person who shall knowingly, or wittingly, or intentionally, or through gross negligence, violate any of the provisions of this chapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and shall upon conviction thereof be subject to a fine of not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500), provided, however, that the provisions of this section shall not apply to KRS 90.220.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 87, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 4. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 10.

metadata.lrc-note: . Acts 1942, ch. 16, Â§ 15, repealed KRS 90.990 of the Bill to Revise the Kentucky Statutes, which was derived from Â§Â§ 2863-9 and 2863-10 of Carroll's Statutes.
